title: ) on the remainder/balance plot within the admissible limit of TDR except in case of development of reserved area under the principle of Accommodation Reservation (AR) under regulation 17
clause_text: ) on the remainder/balance plot within the admissible limit of TDR except in case of development of reserved area under the principle of Accommodation Reservation (AR) under regulation 17. In case of development of reserved area under AR the Note 20(vii) & (viii) of regulation 17(1) shall be made applicable.
section: Floor Space Indices in Residential, Commercial and Industrial Zones
